Disrupting the gym industry one ape at a time.

Apes Together Strong

Tell Me More

Ideology

What to expect when you join the ape side.

Revolution

Revolutionize the gym membership model by bringing Web3 to the real world.

Mindset

Build a community of like-minded apes that will lift each other up.

Gains

We're talking muscle and financial.

Roadmap

  • November & December 2021

    Project Conception

  • January & February 2022

    Development & Marketing

  • February 2022

    Whitelist

    At least 500 whitelist positions will be available. 1 Swole Ape mint per whitelist. Whitelisters are offered Swole Apes at a discounted price.

  • March 2022

    Pre-Sale & Launch

    Our first launch will include 3,333 completely unique Swole Apes. 500 for whitelister pre-sale, and 2,833 at launch.

  • April & May 2022

    DAO Launch on Avalanche

    Airdrop & Whitelist for Swole Ape NFT holders to ensure priority in governance. Pre-sale to establish liquidity, followed by public sale & launch.

  • Q2 & Q3 2022

    Determine Gym Location

    Governance vote in which the first Swole Ape Gym location is determined. LA, NYC, and Miami are current top contenders.

  • Q2 2023

    Gym Grand Opening

  • TBA

    TBA
